name: David PAYO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Lori Kwisnek, and Doctor Joseph Mollura, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Payo v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: David PAYO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Lori Kwisnek, and Doctor Joseph Mollura, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 218
David PAYO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Lori Kwisnek, and Doctor Joseph Mollura, Appellees.
